page.title: 19 AN INKPEN BOOKCASE l985
page.content: To give an idea of the books that are being read by our class in l985 we have made out the list below. It is a time capsule of reading taste in l985 for children in our school aged 9-ll. BFG - Roald Dahl; Exeter Blitz - David Rees; Freeway Fighter - Ian Livingstone; Famous Five and Secret Seven Series by Enid Blyton; Fantastic Mr Fox - Roald Dahl; Biggles Works It Out - Capt, W.E.Johns; The Beano Annual; The Dandy Annual, Flat Stanley - Jeff Brown; The Little Ghost Otfried Preussler; Robert Revolo - Nicolas Fisk; the Heidi books by Johanna Spyri and Charles Trilton; Forest of Dean - Ian Livingstone; the Ha Ha Bonk BOOK - Janet and Alan Ahlber; The Sea of Adventure - Enid Blyton; the Best Friend by Sheila Lavelle and Freckle Juice by Judy Blume
